before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5vh7","text":"Prepare 50 x TAE, 1.5 mol/L Tris-Gly (pH 8.8), 1.0 mol/L Tris-Gly (pH 6.8), 5× Tris-Gly electrophoresis solution, coomassie blue staining solution, destaining solution before start.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"69dqn","text":"This protocol concludes two types of the electrophoresis used to detect target DNA or protein.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

related_equipments.name: Gel Doc XR+ Gel Documentation System
Gel Doc XR+ Gel Documentation System

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9cbbl","text":"Choose suitable electrophoresis method depends on the type of the sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: SDS-PAGE
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9ofv","text":"Protein was detected by SDS-PAGE (sodium dodecyl sulphate–polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"74l9j","text":"Weigh appropriate agarose depends on the concentration of the gel (1% agarose gel for detection and 1% or 2% for gel extraction).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fdhu","text":"Add 1X TAE to a conical flask. Need to prepare 1X TAE with 50X TAE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9u7v3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bn10s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4403h","text":"Extra 2~3ml of 1X TAE was strongly recommended to be added to avoid the reduction of solution during heat.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"38dvf","text":"Heat up by microwave until the solution is homogeneous.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bpi1u","text":"Cool at room temperature for 3~5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5prh","text":"Add 1 μl Gold view into solution and mix well when the solution is about 60℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nv88","text":"Put the solution into bed for polymerize, make sure \"comb\" is well placed and the solution is balanced.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1hl92","text":"Wait about 20 min to let the gel completely concretes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gvqp","text":"Mix the sample with 6 X orange loading buffer and load the sample into the sample holes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b9h6a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fnisv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"55ib8","text":"Remember to load the DNA marker to the sample hole.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a4l8u","text":"Put the bed with gel into the electrophoresis chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fumc2","text":"Set the voltage of electrophoresis (80V~150V) and begin to run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1lclb","text":"Stop running when the front indicator reach about 3/4 length of the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cq88r","text":"Use ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3osoi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ab1kc","text":" to observe the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"knft","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"35po3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"","data":{"id":2185,"brand":"Bio-rad Laboratories","can_edit":0,"guid":"DE855DA0268911ECBF4F8F32C2FD69C4","link":"https://www.bio-rad.com/en-us/product/gel-doc-xr-gel-documentation-system?ID=O494WJE8Z","name":"Gel Doc XR+ Gel Documentation System","sku":"1708195","specifications":null,"type":"Gel Documentation System","vendor":{"id":41,"name":"Bio-rad Laboratories","link":"http://www.bio-rad.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1pekf","text":"Centrifuge 6OD bacteria in 1.5 ml eppendorf (EP) tube at 4,200 x rpm for 5 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6g5cs","text":"Decant or aspirate and discard the culture media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3oamk","text":"Use 600μl ddH2O spirate and dis completely resuspend cell pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8tqhg","text":"Put the EP tube on the ice and use ultrasonic cell disruptor to disrupt cells until the system become clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"emo8q","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000 x rpm  for 10 minute at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ptu","text":"Take 50 µl of supernatant into another EP tube and abandon other supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"acn2i","text":"Completely aspirate residual supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f2c08","text":"Use 600μl ddH2O spirate and dis completely resuspend sediment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"848qe","text":"Take 50 µl of  resuspending into another EP tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3m16f","text":"Add 10μl 6×Protein loading into each EP tube and mix thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cfgv5","text":"Store sample at -20℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dj9v5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e0ad2","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9p8sj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"90mhk","text":"It is necessary to were latex gloves and mask when prepare the gel because most of the reagent are toxic. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2e28s","text":"All the things used in the next steps should be washed after use and can not be touched without wearing gloves.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c0rup","text":"Disposable plastic gloves are not allowed to use.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15rad","text":"Wash glass plates and install the casting stand with the glass plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dg9ah","text":"Inject the water into the pouring trough to check leakage. The liquid level will drawdown in few minutes if the pouring trough has leakage in it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g5d6","text":"Pour out the water completely and make sure the pouring trough is dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85idi","text":"Prepare the separation gel (12%) by mix ingredients below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"44jr4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6vn1h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"f2v0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7hjm2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0":["B"],"1":["_"],"2":["1"],"A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["185",100],"data":[["ddH2O","3.3ml"],["30% Acr- Bis(29:1) ","4ml"],["1.5 mol/L Tris-Gly (pH 8.8)","2.5ml"],["10% SDS","100μl"],["10% Ammonium persulfate","100μl"],["TEMED","4μl"]],"guid":"785D269025E211EC9C4179ACA803C431","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8gfj3","text":"Make sure that add TEMED at last and stir the gel fast to avoid too early concretion of the gel.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mergeCells":[],"printData":[["ddH2O","3.3ml"],["30% Acr- Bis(29:1) ","4ml"],["1.5 mol/L Tris-Gly (pH 8.8)","2.5ml"],["10% SDS","100μl"],["10% Ammonium persulfate","100μl"],["TEMED","4μl"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ks5d","text":"Inject the separation gel into the pouring trough quickly and inject water to full the trough.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e5bpu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"50rrr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"519rj","text":"There is no need to worry about the bubbles during injection because the water can eliminate most of them.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b0vnf","text":"Wait about 30 min to let the gel concrete.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"pa4u","text":"Pour out the water completely.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7huro","text":"Prepare the spacer gel (5%) by mix ingredients below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4q88h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fo0aa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"94mbg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["191",100],"data":[["ddH2O","3.4ml"],["30% Acr- Bis(29:1) ","830μl"],["1.0 mol/L Tris-Gly (pH 6.8)","630μl"],["10% SDS","50μl"],["10% Ammonium persulfate","50μl"],["TEMED","5μl"]],"guid":"078EDC9025EE11EC80A9613E99DE4459","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"11ar2","text":"Make sure that add TEMED at last and stir the gel fast to avoid too early concretion of the gel.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mergeCells":[],"printData":[["ddH2O","3.4ml"],["30% Acr- Bis(29:1) ","830μl"],["1.0 mol/L Tris-Gly (pH 6.8)","630μl"],["10% SDS","50μl"],["10% Ammonium persulfate","50μl"],["TEMED","5μl"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e69ch","text":"Inject the separation gel into the pouring trough quickly to full the trough.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"epgul","text":"Insert the comb into pouring trough.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"53ac2","text":"Wait about 30 min to let the gel concrete.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1rl1u","text":"Pull the comb out carefully.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bcr5","text":"Install the electrophoresis pool and pour the diluted 5× Tris-Gly electrophoresis solution (Tris-Base 15.1g, Glycine 94g, SDS 5g, pH=8.3) into the pool to the appropriate position.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ed1k","text":"Load the sample (20μl）and protein marker (5μl) into the sample holes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d73tm","text":"Install the gel with glass plates into the electrophoresis pool.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"el5c","text":"Run the gel at the voltage of 80V for about 30min and change the voltage to 120V and run the gel until the front indicator run out of the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"99rfe","text":"Stop running and Peel the gel into the plastic box and clean it with distilled water (ddH2O).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4itpa","text":"Add proper amount of coomassie blue staining solution (400ml, coomassie bright blue r-250 0.4g, isopropyl alcohol 100ml, glacial acetic acid 40ml, ddW260ml, filtered) .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3d6gt","text":"Heat by microwave until almost boiling (moderate for about 1min30s ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frqh5","text":"Use the flat table to shake the plastic box   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4qc0t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8F7CA4C0265C11ECA7336557DB20E13C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"30","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cr8sq","text":"Recycle the staining solution to another bottle and wash the gel using ddH2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jptf","text":"Add destaining solution (500ml, glacial acetic acid 50ml, anhydrous ethanol 75ml, distilled water 375ml).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dd4v","text":"Heat by microwave until almost boiling (moderate for about 1min30s ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2d1d","text":"Use the flat table to shake the plastic box   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3penn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"91A5E960268811ECBF4F8F32C2FD69C4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"30","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jq3f","text":"Change the destaining solution and continue to shake until decolor completely.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1e95i","text":"Use ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7n3ef","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1qcd","text":"to observe the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3es58","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"","data":{"id":2185,"brand":"Bio-rad Laboratories","can_edit":0,"guid":"C8BC6E50268911ECBF4F8F32C2FD69C4","link":"https://www.bio-rad.com/en-us/product/gel-doc-xr-gel-documentation-system?ID=O494WJE8Z","name":"Gel Doc XR+ Gel Documentation System","sku":"1708195","specifications":null,"type":"Gel Documentation System","vendor":{"id":41,"name":"Bio-rad Laboratories","link":"http://www.bio-rad.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}

title: Nucleic acid & protein electrophoresis
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"5h8am","text":"It is necessary to were latex gloves and mask when prepare the gel because most of the reagent are toxic. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6on40","text":"All the things used in the next steps should be washed after use and can not be touched without wearing gloves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a743f","text":"Disposable plastic gloves are not allowed to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
